TopicTitle: My sister gave me this t-shirt

Articles.Content:
My sister gave me this:

![UVBYVQn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UVBYVQn.jpg)

I like it.
Very funny ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ! Does your sister play KSP too ?
hahah nice one!
Describes every Kerbal addict in history.
T-shirt is truth.
I could really use a shirt like that.
Give your sister a hug, she cares a lot obviously

I have to ask, is your sister single? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

(Just kidding, in case my gf reads this ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))
so Very True XD that's good,did she make it?
Awesome. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Is she hinting at something? Naaaaahhh... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Haha, awesome. I could use one too.

nice ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

take good care of your sister

i wish i had a sister like her ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

For Christmas last year, my wife got me this KSP t-shirt:

[http://www.redbubble.com/people/olympicos/works/12448154-kerbal-space-program?body_color=grass_green&country_code=US&p=t-shirt&print_location=front&size=medium&style=mens&utm_campaign=shopping&utm_medium=google_products&utm_source=google&gclid=CP6c1dXRisgCFU0YHwodYWEPSg](http://www.redbubble.com/people/olympicos/works/12448154-kerbal-space-program?body_color=grass_green&country_code=US&p=t-shirt&print_location=front&size=medium&style=mens&utm_campaign=shopping&utm_medium=google_products&utm_source=google&gclid=CP6c1dXRisgCFU0YHwodYWEPSg)
Not a lot of us have the T-shirt to prove it!

You sir, have the best sister in the world. 

Take really good care of her. 

Unfortunately, my sister and I don't speak on mutual terms for unforgivable acts on each other's behalf.
so true...... hehe
I want this t-shirt.![KWPKicN.png](http://i.imgur.com/KWPKicN.png)

Two words for your sister:

Tee Fury.
This is so good... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):D
